sentence:
Original sentence: "The royal wedding will be another occasion for the entire Royal Family to get together, and hopefully completely repair Fergie's relationship with the Duke of Edinburgh." 
 Translated sentence: "皇室婚礼将是整个皇室家庭团聚的又一次机会，希望能彻底修复菲姬与爱丁堡公爵的关系。"

Original sentence: "Easy use" 
 Translated sentence: "使 用 方 便"

Original sentence: "Visas in Saudi are currently restricted to expat workers, their dependents and Muslim pilgrims." 
 Translated sentence: "沙特的签证目前仅限于外籍工人、其家属和穆斯林朝圣者。"

Original sentence: ""The President's comments today constitute reprehensible witness intimidation and an attempt to obstruct Congress' impeachment inquiry. We condemn the President's attacks, and we invite our Republican counterparts to do the same because Congress must do all it can to protect this whistleblower, and all whistleblowers," they said. "Threats of violence from the leader of our country have a chilling effect on the entire whistleblower process, with grave consequences for our democracy and national security."" 
 Translated sentence: ""总统今天的言论构成应受谴责的证人恐吓,是阻碍国会弹劾调查的企图,我们谴责总统的袭击,我们请共和党对口单位也这样做,因为国会必须尽其所能保护这位举报人和所有举报人",他们说,"来自我国领导人的暴力威胁对整个举报人进程产生寒蝉效应,给我们的民主和国家安全带来严重后果"。"

Original sentence: "Democrats will hear from constituents about their moves toward impeachment soon, with members scheduled to return to their districts for a two-week recess at the start of October. It will be the first time a swath of members from more conservative districts will receive clear, in-person feedback -- or, in some cases, blowback -- from the people they represent since they joined calls for impeachment proceedings in the wake of the Ukraine allegations earlier this week." 
 Translated sentence: "民主党将很快听取选民关于弹劾行动的意见，议员们将于10月初返回自己的选区进行为期两周的休会，这将是自本周早些时候乌克兰指控后加入弹劾程序的呼吁以来，来自较为保守地区的部分议员首次从他们所代表的民众那里得到明确的、面对面的反馈——或者在某些情况下是反击。"

Original sentence: ""The findings are some of the most distressing and shocking I have ever read."" 
 Translated sentence: "“这些发现是我读过的最令人痛苦和震惊的一部分。”"

Original sentence: "The EU transport commissioner-designate, Romanian socialist politician Rovana Plumb, and the proposed commissioner for EU enlargement, former Hungarian justice minister Laszlo Trocsanyi, were told their confirmation hearings could not go ahead because of inconsistencies in their financial statements, Reuters reported." 
 Translated sentence: "据路透社报道，欧盟候任运输专员、罗马尼亚社会主义政治家罗瓦纳·普拉姆（ Rovana Plumb ）和拟议中的欧盟扩大专员、匈牙利前司法部长拉兹洛·特罗桑尼（ Laszlo Trocsanyi ）被告知，由于财务报表不一致，他们的确认听证会无法进行。"

Original sentence: "May cause liver damage - Per studies, too much coumarin can also be responsible for liver toxicity and damage. This is according to several studies made on the effects of too much coumarin in our bodies." 
 Translated sentence: "可能导致肝脏损伤-研究表明，过多的香豆素也可能导致肝脏毒性和损伤，这是根据对我们体内过多香豆素影响的几项研究得出的结论。"

Original sentence: "A consultation has been launched by the Scottish Government seeking the public's views." 
 Translated sentence: "苏格兰政府已发起咨询，征求公众的意见。"

Original sentence: "Another five students were commended in the world's leading undergraduate awards programme, which recognises top work completed by undergraduates to share this with a global audience." 
 Translated sentence: "另有5名学生在世界领先的本科生奖学金方案中受到表扬,这表彰了本科生为与全球观众分享这一成果而完成的最高级工作。"

Original sentence: "Ash Denham MSP said: "We are holding two reviews into dog control legislation because we are absolutely determined to help keep communities safe from irresponsible owners and their out-of-control dogs." 
 Translated sentence: "Ash Denham MSP说："我们正在对狗控制立法进行两次审查，因为我们绝对决心帮助保护社区免受不负责任的主人和他们失控的狗的伤害。"

Original sentence: "Erik Hanell, president and CEO of Stena Bulk, the operator of the ship, also confirmed the ship's release." 
 Translated sentence: "该船运营商Stena Bulk的总裁兼首席执行官埃里克·哈内尔也证实了该船的释放。"

Original sentence: "He then tied her to a tree and sexually assaulted her." 
 Translated sentence: "然后，他将她绑在树上，并对她进行了性侵犯。"

Original sentence: ""Education workers have been under attack for decades," he continued. "We are finally standing up and fighting back. It's one thing to see classism and the squeezing of the middle class in the corporate world as executives see their relatively obscene pay continue to go up at rates above inflation. But for the same thing to be happening in education is not something workers will continue to tolerate."" 
 Translated sentence: "他继续说：“教育工作者受到攻击已有几十年了。” “我们终于站起来了，进行了反击。当企业高管们看到他们相对淫秽的薪水继续以高于通货膨胀率的速​​度增长时，看到分类主义和企业界中产阶级的紧缩是一回事。在教育界发生的事情并不是工人将继续容忍的事情。”"

Original sentence: "Eight years ago, under Ryan, they lost every game at the Adelaide Sevens." 
 Translated sentence: "八年前，在瑞恩的领导下，他们在阿德雷德七人比赛中输掉了每一场比赛。"

Original sentence: "Made from the inner bark of the Cinnamomum tree, cinnamon is a widely popular spice, earning itself a place in a large variety of food and even becoming a flavor itself." 
 Translated sentence: "肉桂由肉桂树的内部树皮制成，是一种广受欢迎的香料，在各种各样的食物中占有一席之地，甚至成为一种风味。"

Original sentence: "Visas in the desert kingdom, endowed with rich bedouin heritage and archaeological sites, are currently restricted to expat workers, their dependents and Muslim pilgrims travelling to holy sites in Mecca and Medina." 
 Translated sentence: "沙漠王国的签证拥有丰富的贝都因遗产和考古遗址，目前仅限于外籍工人、其家属和前往麦加和麦地那圣地的穆斯林朝圣者。"

Original sentence: ""Yes, an absolute surprise," said astrophysicist Juan Carlos Morales of the Institute of Space Studies of Catalonia at the Institute of Space Sciences in Spain, who led the research published in the journal Science." 
 Translated sentence: "“是的，绝对令人惊讶，”西班牙空间科学研究所加泰罗尼亚空间研究所天体物理学家胡安·卡洛斯·莫拉莱斯说，他领导的研究发表在《科学》杂志上。"

Original sentence: "Addressing the conference, the Assistant Director General and FAO Representative to Ghana, Mr Abebe Haile-Gabriel indicated that the issue of rabies could be minimised if efforts were geared towards vaccination and keeping stray animals away from humans especially children." 
 Translated sentence: "助理总干事兼粮农组织驻加纳代表Abebe Haile Gabriel先生在会议上致辞时表示，如果努力使疫苗接种和使流浪动物远离人类，特别是儿童，狂犬病问题就可以最小化。"

Original sentence: "A gigantic black hole has been captured pulling in and ripping apart a star for the first time." 
 Translated sentence: "一个巨大的黑洞被捕获拉入并首次拆开一颗恒星。"

Original sentence: "Prince Harry walks across Angolan minefield to reconnect with Princes Diana's legacy" 
 Translated sentence: "哈里王子穿过安哥拉雷场，与戴安娜王妃的遗物重新建立联系"

Original sentence: ""Your move," Clinton campaign aide Ian Sams said on Twitter, linking to the Democratic nominee's returns." 
 Translated sentence: "“你的行动， ”克林顿竞选助手Ian Sams在推特上说，与民主党候选人的返回联系在一起。"

Original sentence: "Meghan Markle is determined to 'fulfil her heart's desires' and not let her own needs 'fade away' now she's a member of the Royal Family - and wants to be a role model for young boys as well as girls." 
 Translated sentence: "梅根·马克尔（ Meghan Markle ）决心“满足她内心的愿望”，不要让自己的需求“消失”，现在她已经是皇室成员了——她希望成为年轻男孩和女孩的榜样。"

Original sentence: "Colombian artist Oscar Murillo's work "surge (social cataracts) " depicts people staring out to the North Sea, but with their view of the water and the European continent on the other side of it obscured by a dark canvas, with only a sliver of what lies beyond revealed through a slash in the canvas." 
 Translated sentence: "哥伦比亚艺术家奥斯卡·穆里略（Oscar Murillo）的作品《浪涌（社会性白内障）》描绘了人们凝视北海的情景，但他们对北海和对岸欧洲大陆的看法被一块黑色画布遮住了，透过画布上的一条斜线，只露出了远处的一小部分。"

Original sentence: "Quintero was responsible for the killings of human rights activists and community leaders, the statement added." 
 Translated sentence: "声明还说，金泰罗应对杀害人权活动人士和社区领袖负责。"

Original sentence: "In Nigeria's capital Abuja, Oladosu Adenike marked her 46th consecutive strike on Friday. The activist posted images on Twitter of students dressed in blue school uniforms carrying banners with messages, "Climate change is real" and "We don't have time."" 
 Translated sentence: "在尼日利亚首都阿布贾，奥拉多苏·阿迪内克星期五连续46次罢工。这名活动人士在推特上发布了一些图片，照片中的学生身穿蓝色校服，打着横幅，上面写着“气候变化是真实的”和“我们没有时间”"

Original sentence: "A BAN on advertising for e-cigarettes and vaping products, is being considered by ministers." 
 Translated sentence: "各部长正在审议关于电子公益广告和美化产品的BAN。"

Original sentence: "In case of more severe disturbances, there are also fluctuations in the electricity grid. Satellites providing navigation information are also vulnerable." 
 Translated sentence: "如果发生更严重的干扰, 电网也会出现波动. 提供导航信息的卫星也很脆弱."

Original sentence: ""It's clear we are going to completely break up this group," Duque said in a statement from the United States, where he traveled for the United Nations General Assembly this week." 
 Translated sentence: "′′很显然, 我们将彻底分裂这个集团,"杜克在美国的声明中说, 他本周在那里参加联合国大会."

Original sentence: "He was also in a two-year relationship with Ariana Grande that ended earlier in 2018. After his death she posted an affectionate video of him on her Instagram page and released a song, Thank U Next, that lovingly mentioned him." 
 Translated sentence: "他还与爱莉安娜·格兰德有两年的关系, 这段关系在2018. 年早些时候结束. 在他去世后, 她在她的Instagram页面上发布了一段关于他的亲切视频, 并发布了一首歌, Thank U Next, 那首歌很可爱地提及"

Original sentence: "The husband of Jo Cox said his wife's name must not be used to score political points after Jeremy Corbyn last night posted footage of the murdered MP to criticise Boris Johnson." 
 Translated sentence: "Jo Cox的丈夫说,在杰里米·科尔宾上天晚上发表被谋杀的国会议员影像批评鲍里斯·约翰逊之后,他的妻子的名字决不能用来打分。"

Original sentence: "The star, which was about the same size as our sun, was seen from 375 million light years away warping and spiralling into the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole, researchers said in the Astrophysical Journal." 
 Translated sentence: "研究人员在《天体物理学杂志》上表示，这颗恒星的大小与我们的太阳差不多，是在3.75亿光年外被观测到的，它在一个超大质量黑洞的引力作用下扭曲并螺旋上升。"

Original sentence: "Thankfully, the dog survived with just minor cuts and bruises." 
 Translated sentence: "幸 运 的 是 ， 这 只 狗 只 留 下 了 轻 微 的 伤 口 和 瘀 伤 。"

Original sentence: "Many areas of the country are still getting unprecedented rain, the latest being the town of Pune in western India, where torrential rain on Wednesday and Thursday caused several deaths and havoc from collapsed buildings." 
 Translated sentence: "该国许多地区仍在遭受前所未有的降雨，最近的是印度西部的普纳镇，周三和周四的暴雨造成几人死亡，房屋倒塌也造成了严重破坏。"

Original sentence: ""[Barr has] gone rogue," Pelosi told MSNBC Friday. "I think where they're going is a cover-up of a cover-up. I think it's sad, to have a Justice Department go so rogue. Well, they have been for a while. And now it just makes matters worse."" 
 Translated sentence: "“ 变 得 无 赖 了 ， ” 佩 洛 西 周 五 对 MSNBC 说 。 “ 我 认 为 他 们 要 去 的 地 方 是 掩 盖 事 实 。 我 认 为 司 法 部 变 得 如 此 无 赖 是 可 悲 的 。 好 吧 ， 他 们 已 经 有 一 段 时 间 了 。 现 在 这 只 会 让 事 情 变 得 更 糟 。 ”"

Original sentence: "Hungarian PM Orban defends his candidate for EU executive, "has solutions in pocket"" 
 Translated sentence: "匈牙利总理欧尔班（ Orban ）为他的欧盟执行委员候选人辩护，“口袋里有解决方案”"

Original sentence: "Sam Rainsy went into exile in late 2015 to avoid a two-year prison sentence on charges of criminal defamation. Other legal cases have since been lodged against him by the government." 
 Translated sentence: "山姆·兰西于2015年底流亡，以避免因刑事诽谤罪被判处两年监禁。此后，政府还对他提起了其他法律诉讼。"

Original sentence: "The programme which was held under the theme "Rabies: Vaccinate to eliminate" was organised by the Food and Agriculture Organisation (FAO) in collaboration with the Ministry of Agriculture Veterinary Service." 
 Translated sentence: "粮食及农业组织(粮农组织)与农业兽医服务部合作,举办了主题为"习惯:消灭疫苗"的方案。"

Original sentence: "Police were investigating a deadly crash in the Angeles National Forest Thursday afternoon." 
 Translated sentence: "警方正在调查周四下午在洛杉矶国家森林发生的一起致命车祸。"

Original sentence: "According to him, the 'Zero by 30' Global Strategic Plan "of the 500,000 people who died from rabies each year, 40 per cent are children living in Asia and Africa," and called for holistic approach to deal with the situation to save kids from rabies." 
 Translated sentence: "他表示,"每年死于狂犬病的50万人中,40%是生活在亚洲和非洲的儿童"的"零到30"全球战略计划,并呼吁采取整体办法处理这种情况,以拯救儿童免遭狂犬病之害。"

Original sentence: "Court documents say the surgeon was leaving a Walmart store when he was confronted by an armed man and shoved into a van. They say he was tortured for hours before being returned to his car while unconscious. Surveillance video supports the chain of events. Investigators say Nkorina's wife was a client of the surgeon." 
 Translated sentence: "法庭文件称，这名外科医生在离开沃尔玛商店时遇到一名武装人员，并被推上一辆面包车。他们称他遭受了数小时的折磨，然后在昏迷中被送回车里。监控录像支持这一连串事件。调查人员称，恩科里娜的妻子是这名外科医生的客户。"

Original sentence: "'It sounds dorky, but it's really fun': inside the cosy world of bookstagram" 
 Translated sentence: "′′这听起来很蠢, 但真的很有趣′′: 在书店的舒适世界里"

Original sentence: "Neither chamber of Congress appears to have the two-thirds majority needed to override the president's opposition." 
 Translated sentence: "国会两院似乎都没有必要的三分之二多数来推翻总统的反对。"

Original sentence: "As never before or since, home economists - among them Louise Stanley, chief of the federal Bureau of Home Economics from 1923 to 1943 - drove the country's eating habits." 
 Translated sentence: "家庭经济学家——自1923日至1943年，美国家庭经济事务局局长路易丝·斯坦利（LouiseStanley）一直推动着美国的饮食习惯。"

Original sentence: "Convener Jenny Marra said: "Dog law in Scotland is not fit for purpose. There are still far too many dog attacks on children and little enforcement or understanding of the current laws that might prevent these attacks." 
 Translated sentence: "召集人Jenny Marra说：“苏格兰的狗法不适合用于目的。仍然有太多的狗攻击儿童，很少执行或了解现行法律，可能防止这些攻击。"

Original sentence: "It's day six of the Duke of Sussex' royal tour of Africa with his wife Meghan and baby Archie. But Friday morning, Harry returned to Angola alone to reconnect with the legacy of his late mother, Princess Diana." 
 Translated sentence: "这是苏塞克斯公爵与妻子梅根（Meghan）和婴儿阿尔奇（Archie）进行非洲皇家巡回演唱会的第六天。但是星期五早上，哈利独自回到安哥拉，与已故母亲戴安娜王妃的遗产重新建立联系。"

Original sentence: "He said: "I know of several other guys over the internet who feel the same way," but added that they are "too cowardly to act on their anger."" 
 Translated sentence: "他说："我知道互联网上的其他几个人也有同样的感觉，"但他补充说，他们"太懦弱，不能对自己的愤怒采取行动。""

Original sentence: ""Currently, 86 per cent people living with HIV know their status; that means it leave us with 14 per cent of those living with HIV and do not know their status. So how do we now utilise that additional innovation. Really for me this is it ... how do we now move from this kit and create demand, especially for that 14 per cent that are sick and they need care and they are not getting care," Dr Atwine said." 
 Translated sentence: "“目前，86%的艾滋病毒感染者知道自己的状况；这意味着我们有14%的艾滋病毒感染者不知道自己的状况。因此，我们现在如何利用这种额外的创新。对我来说，真的是这样… …我们现在如何摆脱这种工具包，创造需求，特别是对14%的病人，他们需要护理，他们得不到护理，”Atwine博士说。"

Original sentence: "Helen Cammock's video piece A Long Note, meanwhile, examines the overlooked role of women in the civil rights movement in Derry/Londonderry, Northern Ireland that began in 1968. The work also connects to broader global class, race and gender struggles during the late 1960s." 
 Translated sentence: "与此同时，海伦·卡莫克的一段视频片《长注》审视了1968年开始的北爱尔兰德里/伦敦德里民权运动中被忽视的妇女角色。这项工作还与20世纪60年代末更广泛的全球阶级、种族和性别斗争有关。"

Original sentence: ""These awards are a small attempt by a group of people in public life - of different and no political persuasions - to shine a spotlight on politicians who argue their case with decency and civility, and are able to engage and work with people across the divides that affect us all."" 
 Translated sentence: ""这些奖项是公共生活中一群人 -- -- 不同且没有政治信仰的人 -- -- 的小小小尝试,目的是突出那些以体面和文明的态度为自己辩护并能够与人民接触和合作的政客。"

Original sentence: "Federal authorities declined to pursue civil rights charges Thursday against Sacramento police officers who fatally shot an unarmed black man, a killing that sparked protests and spurred changes to a state law governing when authorities can use deadly force." 
 Translated sentence: "星期四,联邦当局拒绝对致命射杀一名手无寸铁的黑人的Sacramento警察提出公民权利指控,这起杀人事件引发了抗议,并促使修改了关于当局可以使用致命武力的州法律。"

Original sentence: "Trump nominates Peter Gaynor to be FEMA chief: White House" 
 Translated sentence: "特朗普提名彼得*盖纳成为FEMA首席：白宫"

Original sentence: "The IAAF, the global governing body of athletics, said the women's marathon, scheduled to start at midnight on Friday, would go ahead as planned as temperatures would be at or below 30 degrees." 
 Translated sentence: "全球田径管理机构国际田联表示，定于周五午夜开始的女子马拉松将按计划进行，因为气温将在30度或30度以下。"

Original sentence: "The storm isn't forecast to make landfall in the coming days, though a turn toward the northeast Saturday could bring Lorenzo near the Azores in the middle of next week. Forecasters predict the storm will weaken below Category 3 on Monday." 
 Translated sentence: "风暴预计不会在未来几天登陆, 虽然周六朝东北方向转弯可能会在下周中旬将洛伦佐带到亚速尔群岛附近. 气象预报员预测周一风暴将削弱到3级以下."

Original sentence: "It comes after a divisive week in Westminster following the return of Parliament." 
 Translated sentence: "这 是 在 议 会 回 归 后 威 斯 敏 斯 特 经 历 了 分 裂 的 一 周 之 后 发 生 的 。"

Original sentence: "The Centres for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has more than 100 officials investigating the cause of the mystery illness, and has warned citizens against smoking e-cigarette products until more is known, particularly if modified or bought "off the street."" 
 Translated sentence: "疾病控制和预防中心 (CDC) 有 100 多名官员调查这一神秘疾病的原因 ， 并警告公民不要吸烟 ， 直到更多的人知道 ， 特别是如果修改或购买 "街头" 。"

Original sentence: "Ryan Reavis, 36, who was arrested in Lake Havasu City, Arizona, this week is accused of serving as Walter's "runner," who delivered the pills to Pettit." 
 Translated sentence: "瑞恩·里维斯, 36岁, 本周在亚利桑那州哈瓦苏湖市被捕, 被指控担任沃尔特的′′跑步者′′, 他将药送给佩蒂特."

Original sentence: "Since last year, Guodian Group has exported a total of 163 sets of wind power projects from Lianyungang Port to South Africa." 
 Translated sentence: "自去年以来，国电集团已从连云港到南非共出口163套风力发电项目。"

Original sentence: "Authorities have said the officers believed Clark was approaching them with a gun after he ran from them into his grandparents" backyard. The officers had been pursuing Clark after receiving calls about someone breaking car windows and an elderly neighbor's sliding glass door." 
 Translated sentence: "当局说，警方相信克拉克是在从他们身上跑进祖父母的后院后用枪接近他们的。在接到有人打破车窗和一个老邻居的滑动玻璃门的电话后，警察一直在追捕克拉克。"

Original sentence: "Initial reports from the scene said that the vehicle might have been there for some time." 
 Translated sentence: "来自现场的初步报告说，这辆车可能已经在那里呆了一段时间。"

Original sentence: "She starred as Rachel Zane in the New York-set legal drama from 2011 until her final episode aired last year." 
 Translated sentence: "从2011年开始，她出演了瑞秋·赞恩（Rachel Zane），直到去年的最后一集播出为止。"

Original sentence: "Scandal-hit Cleveland police has become the first force to be branded "failing" in all areas by inspectors." 
 Translated sentence: "丑闻缠身的克利夫兰警方已成为第一支在各个领域被检查人员冠以“失败”的警力。"

Original sentence: "Sure enough, Ta Kung Pao, an authoritative media in Hong Kong, revealed that the biggest reason for Ning Zetao to lose is that he has lost interest in swimming." 
 Translated sentence: "果然，香港一家权威媒体 Tagung Book 透露，宁泽东输的最大原因是他对游泳失去了兴趣。"

Original sentence: "Romania and Bulgaria, located on the Black Sea coast, which in the past were allies of the USSR, have joined NATO and the EU since its collapse. In response to Russia's actions, they have asked the alliance to strengthen its presence in the region, writes The Times. In February, 500 US troops arrived at Romania's air base. An Eurofighter Typhoon fighter squadron of the British Air Force is stationed and deployed. Since April last year, these aircraft have repeatedly intercepted Russian fighter jets. Georgia, located on the eastern Black Sea coast, is also concerned about Russia's aspirations. It is not a member of the alliance, but is involved in NATO military exercises. NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said during a visit to Tbilisi in March that the alliance was "preparing" Georgia for accession. Ukraine has also participated in NATO exercises in the region and has been developing its engagement with the Union since 2014." 
 Translated sentence: "罗马尼亚和保加利亚，位于黑海沿岸，这在过去是苏联的盟友，已经加入北约和欧盟，因为它的崩溃。 为了回应俄罗斯的行动，他们已要求联盟加强其在该地区的存在，写时报。 今年二月，500美军抵达罗马尼亚的空军基地。 英国空军的欧洲战斗机台风战斗机中队驻扎和部署。 自去年四月以来，这些飞机多次拦截俄罗斯战斗机。 格鲁吉亚位于黑海东部沿岸，也担心俄罗斯的愿望。 它不是联盟的成员，但参与了北约的军事演习。 北约秘书长斯托尔滕贝格在3月访问第比利斯时表示，北约正在"准备"格鲁吉亚加入。 乌克兰还参加了北约在该地区的演习，并自2014年以来一直在发展与欧盟的接触。"

Original sentence: "It's been one year since a 20-year-old from Long Beach was fatally shot, but the victim's family isn't giving up hope that the shooter will be caught." 
 Translated sentence: "一名来自长滩的20岁少年被枪击身亡已经一年了，但受害者的家人并没有放弃枪手被抓获的希望。"

Original sentence: "He said: "I know of several other guys over the internet who feel the same way," but added that they are "too cowardly to act on their anger."" 
 Translated sentence: "他说：“我认识互联网上的其他几个人也有相同的感觉，”但他补充说，他们“胆小怯to，无法对自己的愤怒采取行动。”"

Original sentence: "The UK's Civil Aviation Authority said today that 72 flights are scheduled to operate to bring back a further 16,000 people to the country following the collapse of travel group Thomas Cook." 
 Translated sentence: "英国民航局今天表示，由于旅行团托马斯·库克（Thomas Cook）倒闭，原定计划运营72班航班，将另外1.6万人带回该国。"

Original sentence: "Seventy-four years ago, two nuclear bombs were detonated over Hiroshima and Nagasaki, killing tens of thousands of people." 
 Translated sentence: "七十四年前, 两枚核弹在广岛和长崎上空引爆, 造成数以万计的人死亡."

Original sentence: "Stars generally are much bigger than even the largest planets that orbit them. But in this case, the star and the planet are not much different in size, the researchers said on Thursday." 
 Translated sentence: "研究人员周四表示，恒星通常比围绕它们运行的最大行星都要大得多，但在这种情况下，恒星和行星的大小并没有太大区别。"

Original sentence: ""Here you walk outside and it's like somebody put a heater on you. I guess that is why they are doing it at night."" 
 Translated sentence: ""如果你走在外面,那就像有人把一个暖气放在你身上,我猜测这就是为什么他们在夜间做这件事。"

Original sentence: "Walter is accused of being the source of the pills that another man, Cameron Pettit, sold to Miller." 
 Translated sentence: "沃尔特被指控是另一个人卡梅隆·佩蒂特（ Cameron Pettit ）卖给米勒的药丸的来源。"

Original sentence: "The 12-year-old who "silenced the world"" 
 Translated sentence: "那 个 “ 让 世 界 噤 声 ” 的 12 岁 少 年"

Original sentence: "Police say it was one of the biggest and best-organized gangs of its kind in Europe. The continent's Europol police agency assisted the investigation." 
 Translated sentence: "警方说，这是欧洲同类组织中规模最大，组织最好的帮派之一。欧洲大陆的欧洲刑警组织协助调查。"

Original sentence: "Parliament has met for the second day since the Supreme Court ruled its suspension as unlawful." 
 Translated sentence: "自最高法院裁定暂停会议为非法以来,议会已举行了第二天的会议。"

Original sentence: "International criticism of the kingdom's human rights record, including the gruesome murder last year of critic Jamal Khashoggi and a crackdown on female activists, could further put off foreign visitors, observers say." 
 Translated sentence: "观察人士表示，国际上对沙特王国人权记录的批评，包括去年批评家贾马尔*哈肖吉（Jamal Khashoggi）的可怕谋杀，以及对女性活动人士的镇压，可能会进一步推迟外国游"

Original sentence: "The consultation runs until January 15 and contains proposals to toughen and clarify the current legislation, including questioning whether a national dog control database should be created." 
 Translated sentence: "磋商将持续到1月15日，其中包括加强和澄清现行立法的建议，包括质疑是否应建立一个国家犬类控制数据库。"

Original sentence: "The California Democrat's words follow a release of the complaint Thursday, which was submitted by an unidentified intelligence official to Intelligence Community Inspector General Michael Atkinson. Atkinson turned it over to national intelligence director Joseph Maguire." 
 Translated sentence: "这位加州民主党人的话是在周四公布了一份由一名身份不明的情报官员提交给情报部门总督察迈克尔阿特金森的申诉之后说的。阿特金森把它交给了国家情报局局长约瑟夫·马奎尔。"

Original sentence: ""Drake told him to pull out all the stops if he wanted to win Khloe back." 
 Translated sentence: "“德雷克告诉他，如果他想赢回克洛，就要全力以赴。"

Original sentence: "'Hideous' Central Coast camouflage child rapist ordered to look at victim in court" 
 Translated sentence: "“可怕”的中央海岸伪装儿童强奸犯被命令在法庭上看着受害者"

Original sentence: "At trial, the defense argued that Haskell was insane and heard voices that led him to kill the six people, NBC affiliate KPRC of Houston reported. After the verdict was read Thursday, he hung his head." 
 Translated sentence: "据NBC下属的休斯敦KPRC报道，在审判中，辩方辩称哈斯克尔疯了，听到了导致他杀死这6人的声音。在周四宣读判决后，他垂下了头。"

Original sentence: "He added: "It's backfired on him now, though, that's the sad thing."" 
 Translated sentence: "他补充道：“不过，现在事与愿违，这才是可悲的事情。”"

Original sentence: "We took their concerns to Dean Baquet, The Times's executive editor, who responded to them in a discussion with the Reader Center:" 
 Translated sentence: "我们对《纽约时报》的执行编辑迪安 · 巴凯 （ Dean Baquet ） 表示关注 ， 他在与读者中心的讨论中对他们做出了回应 ："

Original sentence: "The world's largest coffee company said in a statement Friday that it had found glyphosate residues close to the maximum allowed in some deliveries of green coffee beans." 
 Translated sentence: "这家全球最大的咖啡公司周五在一份声明中说，它发现草甘膦的残留量接近某些生咖啡豆的最高允许限量。"

Original sentence: "In 2017, the kingdom announced a multi-billion dollar project to turn 50 islands and other pristine sites on the Red Sea into luxury resorts." 
 Translated sentence: "2017 年 ， 沙特宣布了一项数十亿美元的项目 ， 将 50 个岛屿和其他在红海的原始地点变成豪华度假村。"

Original sentence: "Romania and Bulgaria, located on the Black Sea coast, which in the past were allies of the USSR, have joined NATO and the EU since its collapse. In response to Russia's actions, they have asked the alliance to strengthen its presence in the region, writes The Times. In February, 500 US troops arrived at Romania's air base. An Eurofighter Typhoon fighter squadron of the British Air Force is stationed and deployed. Since April last year, these aircraft have repeatedly intercepted Russian fighter jets. Georgia, located on the eastern Black Sea coast, is also concerned about Russia's aspirations. It is not a member of the alliance, but is involved in NATO military exercises. NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said during a visit to Tbilisi in March that the alliance was "preparing" Georgia for accession. Ukraine has also participated in NATO exercises in the region and has been developing its engagement with the Union since 2014." 
 Translated sentence: "罗马尼亚和保加利亚, 位于黑海海岸, 过去是苏联的盟友, 自从其崩溃后加入了北约和欧盟. 针对俄罗斯的行动, 他们要求联盟加强其在该地区的存在, 泰晤士报写道. 2月份, 500名美军抵达罗马尼亚空军基地. 英国空军的一个欧洲战士台风战斗机中队已驻扎并部署. 自去年4月以来, 这些飞机一再拦截俄罗斯战斗机. 格鲁吉亚位于黑海东部海岸, 也对俄罗斯的愿望感到关切. 它不是联盟的成员, 但参与了北约的军事演习. 北约秘书长延斯·斯托尔滕贝格3月访问第比利斯时说, 该联盟正在′′准备′′格鲁吉亚加入. 乌克兰还参加了北约在该地区的演习, 并自2014. 年以来一直在发展与联盟的接触."

Original sentence: "There are nations with worse income inequalities, including some with reasonably strong economies. For example, the World Bank estimates that South Africa's Gini index stood at 0.63 in 2014 while Brazil's was 0.53 in 2017. By comparison, all EU countries have a Gini index below 0.4." 
 Translated sentence: "有 些 国 家 的 收 入 不 平 等 情 况 更 严 重 ， 包 括 一 些 经 济 相 当 强 劲 的 国 家 ， 例 如 ， 世 界 银 行 估 计 南 非 的 基 尼 系 数 在 2014 年 为 0.63 ， 而 巴 西 在 2017 年 为 0.53 ， 相 比 之 下 ， 所 有 欧 盟 国 家 的 基 尼 系 数 都 低 于 0.4 。"

Original sentence: "As Lady Gaga once sang in her 2008 hit "Bad Romance": "Walk, walk, fashion, baby."" 
 Translated sentence: "正如 Lady Gaga 曾经在她2008年的热门歌曲《 Bad Romance 》中演唱的那样：“散步，散步，时尚，宝贝。”"

Original sentence: ""If technological advancement became the cause of increasingly evident inequalities, it would not be true and real progress," he warned. "If mankind's so-called technological progress were to become an enemy of the common good, this would lead to an unfortunate regression to a form of barbarism dictated by the law of the strongest."" 
 Translated sentence: "“如果技术进步成为日益明显的不平等的原因，那就不是真正的进步，”他警告说，“如果人类所谓的技术进步成为共同利益的敌人，这将导致不幸地倒退到强者法则所规定的野蛮形式。”"

Original sentence: "The first deaths in Florida and Georgia were announced on Tuesday and Wednesday. Currently 38 states have recorded cases of the illness, with lives lost in eight states." 
 Translated sentence: "星期二和星期三 ， 佛罗里达州和格鲁吉亚的第一批死亡病例被公布 ， 目前有 38 个州记录了这一疾病的病例 ， 8 个州的生命损失。"

Original sentence: "Prince Harry detonated a recently detected mine in Angola." 
 Translated sentence: "哈里王子在安哥拉引爆了一枚最近探测到的地雷。"

Original sentence: "The Democratic-held chamber passed a resolution to terminate Trump's action by a 236-174 margin, sending it to the president. Eleven Republicans and one independent supported it. The Senate already approved the measure in a 54-41 vote, as 11 Republicans joined Democrats in backing it." 
 Translated sentence: "民主党控制的众议院以236票对174票的优势通过了一项终止特朗普行动的决议，并将其提交给总统。11名共和党人和1名独立人士支持该决议。参议院已经以54票对41票通过了该决议，11名共和党人加入了民主党的支持。"

Original sentence: "Junior doctors set to mount further strikes after rejecting Jeremy Hunt's proposal" 
 Translated sentence: "在拒绝了杰里米·亨特的建议后，初级医生开始进一步罢工"

Original sentence: "May cause breathing problems - This is more of a general precaution since cinnamon's fine texture makes it very easy to inhale that may cause coughing and gagging as well as the cinnamaldehyde in it acting as a throat irritant." 
 Translated sentence: "可能会导致呼吸问题-这是更多的一般预防措施，因为肉桂的质地细腻使得它很容易吸入，可能会导致咳嗽和作呕，以及肉桂醛在它作为喉咙刺激性。"

Original sentence: "The cause of the fire is being investigated. The plant is among the highest-risk industrial sites in Europe." 
 Translated sentence: "火灾原因正在调查中。该工厂是欧洲风险最高的工业基地之一。"

Original sentence: "Made from the inner bark of the Cinnamomum tree, cinnamon is a widely popular spice, earning itself a place in a large variety of food and even becoming a flavor itself." 
 Translated sentence: "由肉桂树的内皮制成，肉桂是一种广受欢迎的香料，在各种各样的食物中占有一席之地，甚至成为一种风味本身。"

Original sentence: "Veteran MPs Harriet Harman and Ken Clarke have both been named as potential figures to lead a unity government but a senior SNP source insisted it had to be the Labour leader." 
 Translated sentence: "退伍议员哈里特·哈曼(英语:Harriet Harman)和肯·克拉克(英语:Ken Clarke)都被任命为领导团结政府的潜在人物,但一个资深的SNP人士坚持认为,他们必须成为劳工领袖。"

Original sentence: "In June, the government had compulsorily retired 15 commissioner-level officials of CBIC on charges of corruption, collecting and giving bribes, smuggling and even criminal conspiracy. Prior to that, the government had compulsorily retired 12 senior IRS officials from the Income Tax department over charges of corruption, sexual harassment, disproportionate assets under Rule 56 (J) of the Central Civil Services (Pension) Rules." 
 Translated sentence: "今年6月，政府以腐败、收受贿赂、走私甚至共谋等罪名，强制退休了15名CBIC专员级官员。在此之前，政府根据《中央公务员（养老金）规则》第56（J）条，因腐败、性骚扰、不相称资产等指控，强制从所得税部门退休了12名国税局高级官员。"

Original sentence: "Thunberg was taking part in a protest in Canada on Friday where U.N. aviation leaders were gathering in Montreal to discuss plane emissions targets." 
 Translated sentence: "图 恩 伯 格 周 五 在 加 拿 大 参 加 了 一 场 抗 议 活 动 ， 联 合 国 航 空 领 导 人 聚 集 在 蒙 特 利 尔 讨 论 飞 机 排 放 目 标 。"

Original sentence: "Using silicone, which offers good support, as the underwire, users not only enjoy the comfort of wire-free bras, but also the all-round support of traditional underwired bras." 
 Translated sentence: "使用硅胶，它提供良好的支持，作为线下，用户不仅享受舒适的无丝胸罩，而且全面支持传统的线下胸罩。"

Original sentence: "Saudi Arabia To Offer Tourist Visas For First Time, Abolish Abaya Rule" 
 Translated sentence: "沙特阿拉伯首次提供旅游签证 ， 废除 Abolish Abaya 规则"

Original sentence: "Shortly after the arrest, a search warrant was executed at a home where officers seized a number of items relevant to the investigation." 
 Translated sentence: "在逮捕后不久，在一个家中执行了搜查令，警察在那里扣押了一些与调查有关的物品。"

Original sentence: "Humiliation in the courts at home is a taste of what awaits Johnson in Brussels if he tries to weasel out of his commitments to request an extension. That will comfort European officials, who would most probably agree to it. Mainly because taking more time to find a solution reduces the threat of a no-deal Brexit, which would be economically harmful to both sides." 
 Translated sentence: "国内法庭上的羞辱让人尝到了约翰逊在布鲁塞尔等待他的滋味，如果他试图逃避要求延期的承诺，这将让欧洲官员感到安慰，他们很可能会同意，主要是因为花更多的时间找到解决方案可以减少无协议退欧的威胁，而这对双方都是经济上有害的。"

Original sentence: "During a conversation with the female tech founders Meghan, who has campaigned vigorously for the empowerment of young women and girls, said she hopes to do the same for young men." 
 Translated sentence: "在与女性科技创始人Meghan的谈话中说, 她希望对年轻女性和女孩也能这样做."

Original sentence: "Boris Johnson has been criticised for the tone of language he has used in the Commons chamber" 
 Translated sentence: "鲍里斯·约翰逊因在下议院使用的语言而受到批评"

Original sentence: "Under the proposals, opposition parties would seek to oust Boris Johnson in a vote of no confidence and then form a unity government that would seek an extension to prevent the UK crashing out of the EU on 31 October." 
 Translated sentence: "根据这些提议, 反对党将寻求以不信任票驱逐鲍里斯·约翰逊, 然后组成一个联合政府, 寻求延长任期以防止英国10月31日从欧盟崩溃."

Original sentence: ""It's clear we are going to completely break up this group," Duque said in a statement from the United States, where he traveled for the United Nations General Assembly this week." 
 Translated sentence: "杜克在本周前往联合国大会的美国发表的一份声明中说：“很明显，我们将彻底解散这个组织。”。"

Original sentence: "Greta Thunberg has established herself as the planet's spokeswoman on climate change at the tender age of 16. But long before social media, another teenager was scolding UN leaders on the world stage 27 years ago." 
 Translated sentence: "格 蕾 塔 · 图 恩 伯 格 在 16 岁 时 就 确 立 了 自 己 在 气 候 变 化 问 题 上 的 地 球 代 言 人 的 地 位 ， 但 早 在 社 交 媒 体 之 前 ， 27 年 前 ， 另 一 个 少 年 就 在 世 界 舞 台 上 骂 联 合 国 领 导 人 。"

Original sentence: "I don't believe de Grood should ever be unsupervised permanently. A parole-like system where he has to check in to make sure he's still taking his medication could work well. Arguing that he or other mentally ill people remain institutionalized unless absolutely necessary is a form of segregation. It perpetuates the idea that mentally ill people, those with schizophrenia in particular, cannot ever mesh with society; thus continuing the stigma and perpetuating the idea that they are dangerous criminals. He was found not criminally responsible by a court of law, so why should he be treated like a prisoner instead of someone who was ill and is now better?" 
 Translated sentence: "我不认为德·格罗德应该永远不受监管。一个类似假释的制度，他必须办理登机手续，以确保他仍在服用药物，才能很好地工作。辩称除非绝对必要，否则他或其他精神病患者仍被送进收容机构是一种隔离形式。它延续了精神病患者，特别是精神分裂症患者，永远无法融入社会的观念；从而延续了他们是危险罪犯的耻辱，并延续了他们是危险罪犯的观念。法院认定他没有刑事责任，那么为什么要把他当作囚犯对待，而不是把他当作生病、现在好多了的人对待呢？"

Original sentence: "The allegations were made by WWL's senior vice president Kevin Cassidy and attorneys for the parent company, Entercom. The police department is still working to corroborate the allegations, but have classified the case as possible extortion. In the state of Louisiana, extortion is defined as "the communication of threats to another with the intention (to) obtain anything of value."" 
 Translated sentence: "这些指控是由WWL的高级副总裁凯文·卡西迪（Kevin Cassidy）和母公司Entercom的律师提出的。警察局仍在努力证实这些指控，但已将该案归类为可能的敲诈勒索。在路易斯安那州，敲诈勒索的定义是“将威胁传达给他人，以期获得（有价值）任何有价值的东西”。"

Original sentence: "Pit bull dies of snake bites while protecting Florida boys" 
 Translated sentence: "在保护佛罗里达男孩的同时 ， 它被蛇咬死了"

Original sentence: "The husband of Jo Cox said his wife's name must not be used to score political points after Jeremy Corbyn last night posted footage of the murdered MP to criticise Boris Johnson." 
 Translated sentence: "乔·考克斯的丈夫说，在杰里米·科尔宾昨晚发布了被谋杀的议员批评鲍里斯·约翰逊的录像后，他妻子的名字不能被用来获得政治分数。"

Original sentence: "The test works by detecting antibodies, the body's natural defenders against infection. If one is infected with HIV, these antibodies will be present in your blood and also in the salivia. The test will detect the antibodies in the mouth." 
 Translated sentence: "测试的工作原理是检测抗体，这是人体抵御感染的自然防御者。如果一个人感染了HIV，这些抗体将存在于你的血液中，也存在于盐碱。测试将检测口腔中的抗体。"

Original sentence: "According to Radio Free Asia, Cao said police pressured her to accept their statement that Wang's death had been an accident but she refused. An officer at the Hengyang police station said he could not comment on the case. Wang's mother told the Guardian the family has been offered compensation of more than 2 million yuan (about $220,000)." 
 Translated sentence: "据 自 由 亚 洲 电 台 报 道 ， 曹 说 警 方 向 她 施 压 ， 要 求 她 接 受 他 们 关 于 王 的 死 亡 是 意 外 的 说 法 ， 但 她 拒 绝 了 。 衡 阳 警 察 局 的 一 名 警 官 说 他 不 能 对 此 案 发 表 评 论 。 王 的 母 亲 告 诉 《 卫 报 》 ， 她 的 家 人 已 经 得 到 了 200 多 万 元 ( 约 22 万 美 元 ) 的 赔 偿 。"

Original sentence: "Protesters are also organizing "anti-totalitarianism" rallies in Hong Kong and many cities worldwide on Sunday against what they denounced as China's tyranny." 
 Translated sentence: "周日，抗议者还在香港和全球许多城市组织“反极权主义”集会，抗议他们所谴责的中国的暴政。"

Original sentence: "Their study, which will be published in Nature Communications on Friday, September 27, also shows that viruses that are part of the same structural lineage, based on the protein that they're composed of, adopt consistent icosahedral capsid layouts, providing a new approach to study virus evolution." 
 Translated sentence: "他们的研究将于9月27日星期五发表在《自然通讯》上，该研究还表明，属于同一结构谱系的病毒，基于其组成的蛋白质，采用一致的二十面体衣壳布局，为研究病毒进化提供了新的方法。"

Original sentence: "House rebukes Trump on border wall, but he plans veto" 
 Translated sentence: "众议院在边境墙问题上指责特朗普，但他计划否决。"

Original sentence: "A string of scandals has plagued the force, covering Hartlepool, Redcar and Cleveland, Stockton and Middlesbrough in the north east of England." 
 Translated sentence: "一连串的丑闻困扰着这支部队 ， 涵盖了英格兰东北部的哈莱特库、雷德卡尔和克利夫兰、斯托克顿和米德尔斯堡。"

Original sentence: ""As divisions and bitterness mount in the continuing debates around Brexit, we strongly believe that politics has to respond not by mirroring these trends, but by bucking them." 
 Translated sentence: "“随着围绕脱欧的持续辩论中分歧和痛苦的增加，我们强烈认为政治的反应不是要反映这些趋势，而是要抵制这些趋势。"

Original sentence: "The House of Commons speaker says under current rules it will not be possible to go to the polls before October 31 - the day Britain is scheduled to leave the European Union." 
 Translated sentence: "下议院发言人说,根据现行规则,不可能在10月31日之前 -- -- 英国排定离开欧洲联盟的那一天 -- -- 进行投票。"

Original sentence: "If such education failed, then no matter how successful your career is, you cannot make up for the shortcomings of life and family failure." 
 Translated sentence: "如果这样的教育失败了, 那么无论你的事业有多成功, 你都不能弥补生活和家庭失败的缺点。"

Original sentence: ""In this case, the protoplanetary disk around the young star may be slightly more massive than expected and cold," Morales said. "This makes the disk become unstable so some dense regions can appear. These clumps can grow until they collapse, forming a planet."" 
 Translated sentence: "“在这种情况下，年轻恒星周围的原行星盘可能比预期的质量略大，而且很冷，”莫拉莱斯说，“这使得该星盘变得不稳定，因此会出现一些致密区域。这些团块可以一直生长到坍塌，形成行星。”"

Original sentence: "Man set alight on doorstep 'in targeted attack'" 
 Translated sentence: "男子在“目标攻击”门阶上起火"

Original sentence: "The Equality Act would extend nondiscrimination protections to LGBTQ individuals in credit, education, employment, housing, federal financial assistance, jury service and public accommodations." 
 Translated sentence: "《平等法》将在信贷、教育、就业、住房、联邦财政援助、陪审团服务和公共住宿等方面向LGBTQ个人提供非歧视性保护。"

Original sentence: ""Three out of the six countries, that is the chancellor of Germany, prime minister of Britain, and president of France, all insisted for the meeting to be held, saying that the US would lift all sanctions," stated the Iranian president." 
 Translated sentence: "伊朗总统说："六个国家中有三个，即德国总理，英国首相和法国总统，都坚持要求举行会议，称美国将取消所有制裁。""

Original sentence: "'Hideous' Central Coast camouflage child rapist ordered to look at victim in court" 
 Translated sentence: "“可怕”的中央海岸伪装儿童强奸犯被命令在法庭上看着受害者"

Original sentence: "There are nations with worse income inequalities, including some with reasonably strong economies. For example, the World Bank estimates that South Africa's Gini index stood at 0.63 in 2014 while Brazil's was 0.53 in 2017. By comparison, all EU countries have a Gini index below 0.4." 
 Translated sentence: "有些国家的收入不平等更严重，包括一些经济相当强劲的国家，例如，世界银行估计2014年南非的基尼指数为0.63，而2017年巴西的基尼指数为0.53，相比之下，所有欧盟国家的基尼指数都低于0.4。"

Original sentence: "A prison locksmith has been arrested amid fears keys to a jail's cells have been copied resulting in taxpayers footing a £500,000 bill to replace all its locks." 
 Translated sentence: "一名监狱锁匠因担心监狱牢房的钥匙被复制而被捕，导致纳税人支付50万英镑更换所有锁。"

Original sentence: "May increase the risk of cancer - Unfortunately, while cinnamon can help lower the risk of cancer, it can also very much contribute to the development of it. Per animal studies, consuming too much coumarin, which is commonly found in Cassia cinnamon, may increase the risk of cancer development. Per scientists, coumarin does this by supposedly damaging our DNAs over time." 
 Translated sentence: "可能会增加患癌症的风险-不幸的是，虽然肉桂可以帮助降低患癌症的风险，但它也可以极大地促进癌症的发展。根据动物研究，食用决明子肉桂中常见的香豆素过多可能会增加患癌的风险。根据科学家的说法，香豆素可以随着时间的流逝破坏我们的DNA。"

Original sentence: "Alford said his son was a star football player at Alemany High School, then a stand-out safety on the Long Beach City College football team. Alford said his son was working toward playing for a Division 1 school and had dreams of becoming a nurse." 
 Translated sentence: "阿尔福德说，他的儿子是阿莱曼高中的明星足球运动员，然后是长滩城市学院足球队的突出安全。阿尔福德说，他的儿子正在努力为一师1学校打球，并梦想成为一名护士。"

Original sentence: "The gang allegedly recruited pregnant Bulgarian women who were destitute and willing to give up newborns they might deliver. Authorities say the group sold babies to childless Greek couples." 
 Translated sentence: "据称，该团伙招募了贫穷的保加利亚孕妇，他们愿意放弃可能分娩的新生儿。当局说，该组织将婴儿卖给了没有孩子的希腊夫妇。"

Original sentence: ""Thank you to my friend, Her Royal Highness The Duchess of Sussex @sussexroyal, a thoughtful leader who is breaking the mold and making our world better for it," the former first lady wrote in her glowing post." 
 Translated sentence: "这位前第一夫人在她热情洋溢的帖子中写道：“感谢我的朋友萨塞克斯公爵夫人殿下，她是一位深思熟虑的领袖，她正在打破常规，让我们的世界变得更美好。”"

Original sentence: "The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) -- the agency that oversees GST and import tax collections -- compulsorily retired 15 senior officers under Fundamental Rule 56 (J) on corruption and other charges, official sources said." 
 Translated sentence: "据官方消息来源称 ， 中央税务和海关委员会 (CBIC) ---- 负责监督 GST 和进口税收的机构 ---- 根据基本规则第 56 (J) 条强制退休的 15 名高级官员。"

Original sentence: "Police public relations chief Tse Chun-chung said 207 high school and university students were detained this month alone despite the resumption of classes after the summer holiday, compared to 257 over the June-August period." 
 Translated sentence: "警方公关总监谢振忠表示，尽管暑假后复课，但仅本月就有207名高中生和大学生被拘留，而6月至8月期间为257人。"

Original sentence: "The Sun Sentinel reports 34-year-old Justin Boccio pleaded guilty Thursday to kidnapping and conspiracy to commit kidnapping in the January attack on the surgeon, who hasn't been publicly identified." 
 Translated sentence: "太阳哨兵报道, 34岁的贾斯汀·博西奥在1月份对外科医生的攻击中承认绑架和阴谋绑架罪, 但尚未公开确认."

Original sentence: "Scientists puzzled by really big planet orbiting really little star" 
 Translated sentence: "科学家们对真正的大行星围绕真正的小恒星运行感到困惑。"

Original sentence: "Burning Ravana symbolises the triumph of good over evil. But given that the effigies are made of paper, if the monsoon continues, Ravana might have the last laugh." 
 Translated sentence: "燃烧的罗瓦那象征着善胜恶。但是考虑到雕像是纸制的，如果季风持续下去，拉瓦那可能会笑到最后。"

Original sentence: "Ryan Reavis, 36, who was arrested in Lake Havasu City, Arizona, this week is accused of serving as Walter's "runner," who delivered the pills to Pettit." 
 Translated sentence: "瑞恩·里维斯, 36岁, 本周在亚利桑那州哈瓦苏湖市被捕, 被指控担任沃尔特的′′跑步者′′, 他将药送给佩蒂特."

Original sentence: "The statement on Thursday comes amidst an explosive week in Washington rooted in a whistleblower complaint alleging that Trump abused his official powers "to solicit interference" from Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky in the upcoming 2020 election, and the White House took steps to cover it up. A transcript of July phone conversation released by the White House on Wednesday shows Trump repeatedly pushed Zelensky to investigate former Vice President Joe Biden and his son, Hunter." 
 Translated sentence: "星期四的声明是在华盛顿的一个爆炸性周内发表的,其根源是举报人指控特朗普在即将到来的2020年大选中滥用了乌克兰总统沃洛迪米尔·泽伦斯基的官方权力“寻求干预”,白宫采取了掩盖这一权力的措施,7月白宫在星期三的电话交谈记录显示,特朗普一再敦促泽伦斯基调查前副总统乔·比登和他的儿子亨特。"

Original sentence: "She buried the diamond in her lingerie and carried it all day along, including when she went to toilet and took bath." 
 Translated sentence: "她把钻石埋在她的内衣里，整整一天，包括她去厕所和洗澡。"

Original sentence: "Made from the inner bark of the Cinnamomum tree, cinnamon is a widely popular spice, earning itself a place in a large variety of food and even becoming a flavor itself." 
 Translated sentence: "肉桂是由肉桂树的内皮制成的，是一种广受欢迎的香料，在各种食品中占有一席之地，甚至本身就成为一种风味。"

Original sentence: "Labour argued that the plan was the "simplest and most democratic way to stop no deal."" 
 Translated sentence: "工党认为,该计划是“停止任何交易的最简单和最民主的方法”。"

Original sentence: ""This strike is going to have a lot of effect when people keep showing up, not just today but also in the future and we see different kinds of people from all walks of life," said protester Reinder Rustema." 
 Translated sentence: "抗 议 者 莱 因 德 · 鲁 贝 塔 说 ： “ 当 人 们 不 断 出 现 时 ， 这 次 罢 工 将 会 产 生 很 大 的 影 响 ， 不 仅 是 今 天 ， 而 且 在 未 来 ， 我 们 会 看 到 来 自 各 行 各 业 的 不 同 类 型 的 人 。 ”"

Original sentence: "The federal investigation looked at evidence such as witness statements, audio and video recordings, dispatch records, police reports, and autopsy reports to determine whether the officers acted willfully with the intent to use objectively unreasonable force." 
 Translated sentence: "联邦调查局调查了证人证词、录音录像、派遣记录、警方报告和验尸报告等证据，以确定警察是否故意使用客观上不合理的武力。"

Original sentence: "It was then sucked into oblivion in a rare cosmic occurrence astronomers call a tidal disruption event." 
 Translated sentence: "它在一个罕见的宇宙事件中被吸入遗忘, 天文学家称之为潮汐破坏事件."

Original sentence: "Even before the whistleblower complaint was made available to lawmakers, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi on Tuesday declared Trump had betrayed his oath of office and announced she was opening a formal impeachment inquiry into the President." 
 Translated sentence: "即使在向立法者提出举报之前,众议院议长南希·佩洛西(Nancy Pelosi)星期二宣布特朗普背叛了他的就职宣誓,并宣布她开始对总统进行正式的弹劾调查。"

Original sentence: "Meanwhile two other students, who were also accused of harassment, were issued with final warnings and made to issue apologies." 
 Translated sentence: "与此同时，另外两名学生也被指控骚扰，他们被发出最后警告并被要求道歉。"

Original sentence: "It says by 2030 it aims to attract up to 100 million annual visits by both domestic and foreign tourists." 
 Translated sentence: "报告称，到2030年，它的目标是吸引多达1亿的国内外游客每年访问。"

Original sentence: "Tristan cheated on Khloe when she was nine months pregnant" 
 Translated sentence: "特里斯坦怀孕九个月时背叛了克洛"

Original sentence: ""Queer Eye" star Jonathan Van Ness strutted his stuff on Capitol Hill on Thursday, joining forces with House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) to discuss the Equality Act." 
 Translated sentence: "′′ Queer Eye ′′明星Jonathan Van Ness周四在国会山上展示了他的东西, 与众议院议长Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.)一起讨论[平等法案"

Original sentence: ""In the days following the phone call, I learned from multiple U.S. officials that senior White House officials had intervened to "lock down" all records of the phone call, especially the official word-for-word transcript of the call that was produced - as customary - by the White House Situation Room," the whistleblower stated." 
 Translated sentence: "告密者说 ： “在接到电话后的几天里 ， 我从多名美国官员那里得知 ， 白宫高级官员干预了“ 锁定 ” 所有的电话记录 ， 特别是白宫情况室的正式电话记录。"
